thrive.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to become very successful or very strong and healthy
thrive.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: plants that thrive in tropical rain forests
a business which managed to thrive during a recession
thrive.translation[0].definitions[0].not: In everyday English, people usually say do well rather than thrive:
The whole family seems to be doing well.
thrive.translation[1].definitions[0].def: if a company, market, or place is thriving, it is very successful and making a lot of money
thrive.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: Our natural food supermarkets are thriving.
